Container.Name: WatchMediaServer
Container.Overview: Watch Media Server - Netflix-style media streaming application for your personal media collection. Organize and stream your movies, TV shows, and other media content with a modern web interface.
Container.Description:
Watch Media Server is a modern, Netflix-style media streaming application designed to organize and stream your personal media collection. Built with Python Flask and featuring a responsive web interface, it provides an intuitive way to manage and enjoy your movies, TV shows, and other media content.
Key Features: - Netflix-style user interface - Automatic media library scanning - Smart categorization (Movies, TV Shows, Kids, Music Videos) - Real-time streaming with multiple format support - Responsive design for all devices - Dark/Light theme support - RESTful API for integration - Docker containerization
Supported Formats: MP4, MKV, AVI, MOV, WMV, FLV, WebM
Version: 1.3.0 Build Date: 2025-09-14
